5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Iyas bin Salamah bin Akwa’ narrated that his father said:“We used to perform Friday (prayer) with the Prophet (ﷺ), then we would return, and we would not see any shadow from the walls in which we could seek shade.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وَقْتِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the time of Friday (Prayer)
